data.title: Trans-Mongolian Winter Railway: St. Petersburg to Beijing
data.meta_description: Looking for Private or Group Tours tour to Russia? Join tour.duration guided tour Trans-Mongolian Winter Railway: St. Petersburg to Beijing. Book this trip now!
data.text:
CHECK OUT WHAT OTHERS SAY ABOUT TRAVELLING WITH US

Nathan Adams, Australia: Travelled on the Trans - Siberian Railway in Dec 2019/Jan 2020.

What can i say. Since the moment i made contact from Australia and was thinking of a new adventure in Russia the communication, the staff, the ease of use, the price all came into play. Out of that i received friendship, laughs, experiences, memories and of course A holiday I will cherish in more ways than one. If you're considering Russia. Yes. Do it. All the way, you will love it. Food, history, people, experiences (and of course a few cheeky drinks).

If you're looking for a team that will make it happen. Yes. Discovery Russia is your team, from abroad, back home and on the ground. It's my last day of a 18 day holiday to Russia. The people on tour, the team/guides. I m going to miss them all. Your inclusions will leave you exhausted, but so glad you choose it all. I know I'm coming back.
